meanings.sent1: The misfocussed camera made the picture blurry.
meanings.sent2: She realized her misfocussed efforts were leading her astray.
meanings.sent3: The misfocussed cat tried to catch its own tail.
meanings.sent4: His misfocussed mind wandered aimlessly in class.
meanings.sent5: The misfocussed light created strange shadows in the room.

meanings.sent1: He misfocussed the telescope and couldn't see the stars clearly.
meanings.sent2: They misfocussed their attention on the wrong details.
meanings.sent3: The misfocussed chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: Her misfocussed aim caused the arrow to miss the target.
meanings.sent5: The misfocussed compass led them in circles in the forest.
